fields.fieldDescription: The funded outstanding's share of the Deal's Accruing Admin Fees
The funded outstanding's share of the Deal's Unamortized Admin Fees
The funded outstanding's share of the Deal's Fees Held Awaiting Disposition
The sum of all the debit and credit G/L entries for Accrued Interest Receivable (INTRC) for this Outstanding, where the Accrual Indicator is equal to Y
The sum of all the debit and credit G/L entries for Principal (PRINC) for this Outstanding.

Equal to the Outstanding's Book Principal Balance plus the Interest Cycle Due plus the Fees on Lender Shares plus the Fees on Issuing Bank Shares minus the Outstanding's Unamortized Discount plus the allocated share of the Deal Admin Fees minus the allocated share of the Deal Unamortized Admin Fees minus the allocated share of the Deal FHAD plus the allocated share of the Facility Ongoing Fees minus the allocated share of the Facility Unamortized Discount plus the allocated share of the Facility Unrealized P/L
The funded outstanding's share of the Facility's Ongoing Fees cycle due.
The sum of all the G/L entries for Bill of Exchange Unamortized Discount (DOSAI) for this Outstanding
The sum of all the G/L entries for the Fee on Issuing Bank Shares (ISSBS) for this SBLC Outstanding
The sum of all the G/L entries for the Fee on Lender Shares (FELSH) for this SBLC Outstanding
The funded outstanding's share of the Facility's Unamortized Discount.
The funded outstanding's share of the Facility's Unrealized P/L.
'FAC' if this is a facility record. 'OST' if this is an outstanding record.
RID of the Customer

The Current Business Date will also be displayed as the "Run as of' Date when the entry is created by the Standard Batch Process and will be the requested "as-of" date (equal to the last calendar date in the previous month) when the entry is created by the Special "as-of" Batch Process.
The Current Business Date is displayed as the Run Date of the batch job creating the entry record.
RID of the Deal
RID of the Facility
RID and Primary Key of this table
RID of the Outstanding.  Set to NONE when this is a facility related record
Timestamp from when this row was created.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
The Branch Identifier
